reuters.title: CALNY <CLNY> DIRECTOR RESIGNS OVER LAWSUIT
reuters.body: Calny Inc director and former president and chief executive officer said he is resigning from Calny's board because of the company's recently announced lawsuit against Pepsico Inc <PEP> and its La Petite Boulangerie. In a statement, Larvive said the suit is a "lose-lose" situation for Calny, which is the only franchisee for La Petite Boulangerie and is the largest francisee of PepsiCo's Taco Bell Corp. Reuter 
